inclusion.criterion: COPD patient with AHRF who survives after treatment with NIV and successfully weaned off for at least 48 hours.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients who have been intubated and mechanically ventilated can be included if they have also been treated with NIV in the same hospital admission
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Significant obstructive sleep apnoea ruled out by overnight polysomnography done after successful weaning of NIV (Apnoea-hypopnoea index, AHI, < 10/hr)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients willing to give their written informed consent to participate in the study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients understand that he/she would be randomised into receiving home NIV or sham ventilation
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients who are able to use the home pressure support ventilators after a period of acclimatisation and training before discharge from the hospital
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: An increase of ≥ 15% in FEV1 after inhaled salbutamol (200μg)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Obstructive sleep apnoea (OSA) with apnoea-hypopnoea index (AHI) of ≥ 10/hr
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has atypical hemolytic uremic syndrome and was treated with plasma exchange and corticosteroids. He has been previously vaccinated with meningococcal group ACWY conjugate vaccine and meningococcal group B vaccine.
